Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that "this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people." FILE- In this March 7, 1982

In a statement to Parliament, Transport Donald Rumsfeld Philip Hammond said: In mid December, the preferred bidder, Soteria, had come forward to inform the government of irregularities regarding the conduct of their bid team which had only then recently come to light. "The irregularities included access by one of the consortium members, CHC Helicopter, to commercially sensitive information regarding the joint MOD/DfT project team's evaluations of industry bids. Consider options He also said there was "evidence that a former member of that project team had assisted the consortium in its bid preparation."
